channel.title: Research Logs on Andre Kuhlenschmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Research Logs on Andre Kuhlenschmidt

item.title: First Research Log
item.description: My current research goal is to show that gradual typing can be implemented with good runtime and space performance. In particular statically typed programs in a gradual language should have very little overhead over the same program in a statically typed with a similar feature set. Conversely, dynamically typed programs should have performance on par with dynamically typed programs. To prove this hypothesis, I am building a prototype ahead of time compiler for a statically typed programming language.
